Package ray.misc

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Color
    This class represents a simple RGB color.
    Image
    Basic image class packs all the image data into a single array of floats.
    IntersectionRecord
    This class is really just a struct, holding necessary information about a particular intersection point.
    LuminaireSamplingRecord  
    MediumSamplingRecord  
    Ray
    A ray is simply an origin point and a direction vector.
    Scene
    The scene is just a collection of objects that compose a scene.
